product_name: United By Blue Chase the Sun Shirt - Women's
long_description: Feel good twice over when you wear the women's Chase the Sun Shirt from United By Blue-it's made of eco-friendly organic cotton and your purchase helps clean the Earth's blue waters. For every product sold, United By Blue removes 1 pound of trash from the world's oceans and waterways. Stone-washed slub jersey knit is made of breathable organic cotton that's grown without the use of toxic pesticides. Chase the Sun Shirt for women from United By Blue features a flattering V-neck.
short_description: Feel good twice over when you wear the women's Chase the Sun Shirt from United By Blue-it's made of eco-friendly organic cotton and your purchase helps clean the Earth's blue waters.
